name: Tri gone mETry
description: In this puzzle game you will be in control of a trio of ET workers that will need to fix the power source of several establishments throughout the galaxy, but there is a twist, each alien has its own set of skills and the time in which you control them is purely luck. If you're able to complete it, you will return them to the headquarters through a waygate. Will you be able to complete all those challenges and beat the community records? Play and find out!
